| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A mighty old lich, notorious for blasting people with powerful conjurations at the slightest provocation, or just on a whim. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 Trivia](#Trivia)

## Useful Info

**Master Blaster** is the final boss of the Thunderdome [Dungeon Sprint](/Dungeon_Sprint "Dungeon Sprint") map.

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                                     |
| :-------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm") (8d23)                       |
| Slot2     | [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm") (8d23)                       |
| Slot3     | [Glaciate](/Glaciate "Glaciate") (10-198)                           |
| Slot4     | [Miasma](/Miasma_\(monster_spell\) "Miasma (monster spell)") (3d20) |
| Slot5     | [Teleport Self](/Teleport_Self "Teleport Self")                     |
| Slot6     | *none*                                                              |

## Tips & Tricks

- Use quad damage to render his absurd durability a lot less insurmountable.
- He's just as vulnerable to [silence](/Silence "Silence") as any other [ancient lich](/Ancient_lich "Ancient lich"). This may or may not actually help though, given his high HP and HD. [Life protection](/Life_protection "Life protection") and a [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") weapon also help.

## Trivia

Master Blaster (and the Thunderdome map in general) is a reference to the 1985 film [Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mad_Max_Beyond_Thunderdome).

Master Blaster

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.
Version 0.13: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.


This chart is not updated automatically.
It may contain outdated information.
Master Blaster L 
HP 1500
HD 30
XP 15000
Speed 10
AC 20
EV 10
MR Immune
Attack1 20 (touch: drain experience)
Attack2
Attack3
Attack4
Max Chunks 0
Type of Meat None
Resistances rF+, rC++,
rElec, rPois+++,
rN+++, rTorm,
rRot+++, rDrown
Vulnerabilities Holy, Holy wrath
Habitat Land
Intelligence High
Uses Open doors
Holiness Undead
Size Medium
Type lich, lich
Flags Actual spells
Evil
See invisible
Speaks
Spellcaster
Vault
A mighty old lich, notorious for blasting people with powerful conjurations at the slightest provocation, or just on a whim.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 Trivia

Useful Info

Master Blaster is the final boss of the Thunderdome Dungeon Sprint map.

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Fire Storm (8d23)
Slot2 Fire Storm (8d23)
Slot3 Glaciate (10-198)
Slot4 Miasma (3d20)
Slot5 Teleport Self
Slot6 none

Tips & Tricks

  • Use quad damage to render his absurd durability a lot less insurmountable.
  • He's just as vulnerable to silence as any other ancient lich. This may or may not actually help though, given his high HP and HD. Life protection and a holy wrath weapon also help.

Trivia

Master Blaster (and the Thunderdome map in general) is a reference to the 1985 film Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome.
